title: Textile
medium:
Medium: silk, paper with applied gold foil
Technique: plain compound satin
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 25.1 x 8.6 cm (9 7/8 x 3 3/8 in.)
description: Gold silk satin ground with pattern of sinuous vines, flowers, and lozenge shapes. Pattern woven in weft with tarnished metallic covered paper threads, green and blue silk.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile.
Medium: silk, paper with applied gold foil
Technique: plain compound satin. Gift of Frances Morris. 1951-111-38-a.
